channel.title: MoparClassic throws an error when saving players
channel.description: Whenever I log out with a player, I get this output: [code][java] Adding save data for: Ryland [java] WARNING ATTEMPTED DUPE [java] Error saving: Ryland[/code] The weird thing is, everything seems to save fine. My location and all my stats and items are preserved when I restart the server and log back in. Could something else important not be saving correctly? Could I have misconfigured my database settings? What does it mean by "WARNING ATTEMPTED DUPE?" Any help would be appreciated. Thanks!

item.title: MoparClassic throws an error when saving players
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

The issue is that you’re not saving the owner field or not doing it properly.

Read full topic
item.source: MoparClassic throws an error when saving players

item.title: MoparClassic throws an error when saving players
item.dc:creator: @RylandAlmanza RylandAlmanza
item.description:
@RylandAlmanza wrote:

Whenever I log out with a player, I get this output:

[java] Adding save data for: Ryland [java] WARNING ATTEMPTED DUPE [java] Error saving: Ryland
The weird thing is, everything seems to save fine. My location and all my stats and items are preserved when I restart the server and log back in. Could something else important not be saving correctly? Could I have misconfigured my database settings? What does it mean by “WARNING ATTEMPTED DUPE?” Any help would be appreciated. Thanks!

Read full topic
